en.welcomeParagraph1: Hello, I'm Lucas Pereira da Silva, a front-end developer! I'm currently studying Systems Analysis and Development at Est√°cio de S√° University and I hold a Bachelor's degree in Automotive Engineering from the University of Bras√≠lia (UnB). I have about a year and a half of experience in web development, primarily focusing on front-end technologies.
en.welcomeParagraph2: I have skills in JavaScript, TypeScript, and React, as well as knowledge in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP). I have experience in team collaboration using agile methodologies, specifically Scrum and Kanban, which have helped me enhance my collaboration and delivery skills.
en.welcomeParagraph3: I love combining my engineering background with my passion for coding, always looking for new challenges to tackle and ways to grow as a developer. Let's create something amazing together!

en.projectTechs1: React, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML5 and SASS
en.projectDesc1: This To-do List project was developed in collaboration with friends from the Coding Cerrado organization on GitHub. Our goal was to apply Scrum and Kanban methodologies, starting a project from scratch in React, taking it from a Figma design to a fully functional application.
en.projectFeatures1: Key tools and technologies used in this project include:
en.projectFeatureList1-1: TypeScript for type safety and code clarity;
en.projectFeatureList1-2: React Hooks for managing state and lifecycle events;
en.projectFeatureList1-3: Local Storage for persistent data storage.
en.projectLearnings1: This project provided an excellent opportunity to practice agile methodologies and teamwork, while also honing our skills in modern web development technologies.
en.projectDesc2: This Personal Portfolio project was initially developed in collaboration with friends from the Coding Cerrado organization on GitHub. However, I took over the project independently at a later stage. The project was built using only JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3.
en.projectFeatures2: Key features of the project include:
en.projectFeatureList2-1: Responsive Design: Ensures optimal viewing experience across all devices;
en.projectFeatureList2-2: Modern Layout: Clean and intuitive design for all pages.
en.projectLearnings2: This project showcases my ability to create a fully functional and visually appealing personal portfolio from scratch, emphasizing responsiveness and user experience.
en.projectTechs3: React, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML5 and CSS3
en.projectDesc3: This Interactive BMI (Body Mass Index) Calculator was developed using React, TypeScript, HTML, and CSS. The project allows users to easily calculate their BMI by entering their height and weight.
en.projectFeatures3: Key features of the project include:
en.projectFeatureList3-1: React and TypeScript: For building a robust and scalable application;
en.projectFeatureList3-2: User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design for ease of use;
en.projectFeatureList3-3: Responsive Design: Ensures optimal usability across various devices;
en.projectLearnings3: This project demonstrates my ability to create interactive and responsive web applications, leveraging modern web development technologies.
en.projectDesc4: This project is a Static HTML Email, developed as part of a selection process. The email was created using only HTML and CSS.
en.projectLearnings4: This project highlights my ability to create well-structured and visually appealing emails using fundamental web technologies.
